[:page:PageHeader][:toc:]
+ Example Insert Page

To insert the content of e.g. the ScratchPad page, write:

[:page:ScratchPad]
----
Or use quotation:

[:page:"ScratchPad"]
----
[:page:'''ScratchPad''']
----
[:page://ScratchPad//]
----
[:page://///ScratchPad/////]
----
[:page:\\ScratchPad\\]
----

If you switch to PagePreview now, you will see the content of the ScratchPad page above, instead of the insertion tag.

In the example above, "page" is the insertion key, "ScratchPad" is the value.
